title: Home
text:
Hello! I’m Himmat Singh Grewal, a passionate and detail-oriented professional with experience in:

🔹 Business Analytics
🔹 Project Research & Reporting
🔹 Safety & First Aid Certifications
🔹 Quarto-based Web Projects

This website is a showcase of my:

📄 Resume
💼 Projects
🧠 Skills & Certifications
🧭 Leadership & Community Service
📬 Contact Information




I specialize in data-driven decision-making, creative problem-solving, and clear communication. Whether it’s preparing a business report, analyzing trends, or building a clean Quarto portfolio, I love making complex information understandable and impactful.





🧠 Conducted an in-depth business research project on Netflix’s ad strategy using PESTELE & SWOT
📈 Developed interactive dashboards with Quarto and Plotly
✅ Certified in Occupational First Aid Level 1 & First Safety License
❤️ Contributed to various community service and leadership initiatives





Use the menu above or jump straight to a section that interests you.
Thanks for stopping by — I hope you enjoy exploring my work!

title: Resume
text:

I am an MBA candidate with a background in e-commerce, digital marketing, and customer service. I bring a practical understanding of business operations, strong communication skills, and a growth mindset focused on developing expertise in finance, strategy, and data analysis.

- Provided tailored product recommendations based on customer preferences

title: Projects
text:
Explore a selection of my projects across data analytics, business strategy, and web design.





📍 Objective: Visualize and analyze patterns in Toronto fire incidents by neighborhood, time, and cause.
📊 Tool Used: Tableau Public
🧠 Insights:

Downtown areas had the highest frequency of incidents.
Cooking-related fires were the most common residential cause.
Spike in winter months linked to heating appliances.

🔗 View Interactive Dashboard: 👉 Toronto Fire Incidents Tableau Dashboard


“This project helped identify spatial and seasonal fire risk trends to support awareness campaigns and resource allocation.”





📌 Objective: Analyze and improve the performance of Netflix’s ad-supported plan.
🛠 Tools: SWOT, PESTELE, Quarto.
📈 Outcome: Delivered a data-driven campaign proposal with actionable insights for market positioning.






🔧 Built With: Quarto + Plotly.
💡 Features: Real-time sales data, filterable views, and exportable reports.
🗂 Used For: Weekly performance reviews and executive presentations.






🧰 Tools: Excel, Power BI.
📊 Goal: Identified trends in Sales of proucts as per demographics, and popularity.
✅ Result: showcase all the data of products sales






🎨 Built Using: Quarto, HTML/CSS, Font Awesome.
🌍 Features: Multi-page layout, responsive design, embedded interactive charts and blog section.
🔗 View Source on GitHub




Want to collaborate or know more about any of these? Contact me.

title: Community Service
text:
Giving back to the community has been a cornerstone of my personal and professional development. Below are highlights of my most meaningful service experiences.




📦 Serving meals on a weekly basis

⏱️ Logged over 50 volunteer hours

💞 Supported community members facing food insecurity






🎨 Designed posters and managed social media outreach

🧹 Organized clean-up events

🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Led a team of 10 volunteers

💰 Raised $500+ for local environmental causes

🗣️ Participated in environmental advocacy workshops

📊 Conducted community surveys to assess needs






📚 Tutored kids in India

🧠 Designed personalized study plans and materials

📈 Helped improve grades by an average of 20%

🤝 Collaborated with teachers and parents

🌟 Participated in community outreach and engagement

text:
